name: codebase-investigation
description: Pure exploration task with no code changes. Tests depth of investigation and accuracy of findings. Opus 4.5 showed slight advantage on investigation tasks.

commands: wc -l /tmp/investigation-report.org | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I{} test {} -gt 50 && echo 'report substantial'

expected_behavioral_difference: Opus 4.5 showed slight advantage on investigation tasks; measuring depth of exploration, number of files examined, accuracy of conclusions
